sentences.en: But all who read, and most do read, endeavor to obtain smattering in that science.
sentences.cn: 所有读法律的人, 其中大多数也确实读了点书, 但他们所努力获得的只是对这门科学的一知半解.

sentences.en: David has only a smattering of astronomy.
sentences.cn: 大卫对天文学只是一知半解.

sentences.en: Despite the green hues in this image, these rocky islands are too cold to sustain more than a smattering of low-growing vegetation.
sentences.cn: 除了图中绿色的部分，这些气候严寒，主要为岩石构造的岛屿上，只有极少数低矮植物可以生存。

sentences.en: He has a smattering of French.
He has a smattering of knowledge about physics.
He only has a smattering of French.
I had acquired a smattering of Greek.
sentences.cn: 我学会了一丁点希腊语。

sentences.en: I only have a smattering of English.
sentences.cn: 对英语我只懂一点皮毛.

sentences.en: I've only got a smattering of experience with computers.
sentences.cn: 关于计算机我只略微有点经验.

sentences.en: It is dangerous that you have a smattering of superficial knowledge on a subject.
sentences.cn: 对于任何问题一知半解的知识都是危险的.

sentences.en: On his wanderings he's picked up Spanish, Italian, French and a smattering of Russian.
sentences.cn: 在流浪途中，他学会了西班牙语、意大利语、法语和一丁点儿俄语。

sentences.en: People with a smattering of physics may bring up " quantum mechanical vacuum fluctuations "
sentences.cn: 对物理学一知半解的人们可能会提出 “ 量子力学真空涨落 ”

sentences.en: Plastic crates held French books as well as a smattering of English titles, mostly movie and television picture volumes.
sentences.cn: 塑料筐里装着法国书籍及少数的英国书，很多都是电影和电视图片册。

sentences.en: Sunset beach: Megan rests her head on Brian's shoulder a smattering of gardenias providing decoration.
sentences.cn: 日落海滩: 梅根将她的头轻轻靠在老公肩膀上,无比幸福.

sentences.en: The doctor spoke some pidgin Vietnamese, and the nurse a smattering of highschool French.
sentences.cn: 这位军医能讲几句洋泾浜的越南语, 护士也能讲几句半生不熟的法语.

sentences.en: There's only a smattering of people who oppose the proposal.
sentences.cn: 只有少数人反对这一建议.

words.tran_cn: 略知，浅知；东拉西扯地泛论；略会说
略知；肤浅地学习；粉碎（smatter的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: a small number or amount of something

trans.tran_cn: 充内行( smatter的现在分词 )
